name: JetHunt
overview: Jake "Hard" Ammo was a legendary Jethunter. The Jethunters are called upon to visit mining planets where the miners have been overcome and trapped. This is the story of his first mission. Jake's first mission was to do a tour of duty on the planet Coagulus where he must amass a total of at least one million points by rescuing miners and destroying the mine vermin before his tour ends and he can go home. Using his Jetpack and a small amount of explosives and wearing his rescue suit incorporating a limited power supply Jake enters the first mine. The suit facilitates a number of beam out and back in features should Jake be overcome by the vermin. "Lives" if you will. The suit also features the Skulldriller head mounted mining laser for close destruction of fragile walls and mine vermin.
